actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A resolution to amend the Senate Resolution 370, Nintey-fifth Congress, authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Governmental Affairs for inquiries and investigations.

summary.text: Amends Senate Resolution 370 (95th Congress) to authorize duly authorized subcommittees of the Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs to undertake specified activities related to certain inquiries and investigations conducted by the committee.

titles.title: A resolution to amend the Senate Resolution 370, Nintey-fifth Congress, authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Governmental Affairs for inquiries and investigations.
